name: Pablo (Bluesman)
description: Can play the blues harp to make four levels of noise

name: Miguel (Deep pockets)
description: Carry more things. Five inventory slots

name: Yami (Though gal)
description: Receives one less damage by attack, but only has two life points

name: Xenia (Rollergirl)
description: She has a pair of rollerblades, so can roll two squares when moves

name: Alex (Actionman)
description: Combat veteran, has four actions, but only one life points

name: Paul  (Company CEO)
description: Great time management skills, has four actions, but only one life points

name: Antonio  (Hawaiian musician)
description: Can play the ukelele harp to make four levels of noise

name: Ivan  (Ninja)
description: Can dodge one damage point by attack, but only has two life points

name: Alejandro  (Crossfitter)
description: Phisical prowess! He has four life points

name: Jesus  (Strong man)
description: He is so strong that can carry 5 items

name: David  (Fast)
description: He is fast! Moves two squares every time
